section.title: Uses of would
section.text1a: Would you help me get these files down?
section.sectiontitle2: Use would for a recurring situation in the past.
section.text3a: She would always have a bag of sweets in her pocket.

section.title: Uses of would
section.sectiontitle: Use would for a past purpose/reason (often used after 'so that').
section.text1a: We took a taxi so (that) we wouldn't be late.
section.text3a: I'd love to know what happened to her.

section.title: Uses of would
section.sectiontitle: Use would for a strong wish that someone would/wouldn't do something
section.text1a: I wish he would make more of an effort at school.
section.sectiontitle2: Use would for a past intention/expectation (reported), and a past refusal
section.text3a: They asked if we would like anything to drink.
section.text4a: He wouldn't let go of my bag.
